Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! My name is, Connor, AKA, Ninjainthenight.

I came by to introduce myself, I\'ve had KSP for a long while now and only just recently decided to make a KSP Fourm account.

I hope to make a LP of KSP so I\'ve recorded the first ep and here it is!

Hope you\'ll enjoy it!

P.S Sorry if I sounds like I am rambling and ran out of stuff to say, this is my first time commentating ;P

Big thanks to- Tryingtolive for most of the design rocket I had used in the episode and for teaching me most of what I know about KSP

His channel- http://www.youtube.com/user/trydyingtolive

Let\'s Play: Kerbal Space Program Pt.1
Welcome to the forums! Great LP! I would enjoy seeing more!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
